citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 am to
12:05 pm on 12-JUL-17.
Inspectors arrived at 11:20 to a locked gate. Inspectors called out for licensee, honked horn and called both phone
numbers and left messages.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 am to
12:05 pm on 12-JUL-17.
Inspectors arrived at 11:20 to a locked gate.  Inspectors called out for licensee, honked horn and called both phone
numbers and left messages.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
